home.readyTitle: Ready to create your professional resume?
home.readyDescription: Get started now and have a professional resume ready in minutes. Our AI-powered platform will help you create a standout document.

features.title: Get Hired Faster
features.subtitle: Everything you need to create standout job applications
features.description: Our AI-powered platform helps you create professionally crafted resumes and cover letters that stand out to both hiring managers and application systems.

aiPoweredContent.description: Use AI to generate professional content for your resume and cover letters based on your experience.

atsOptimized.name: ATS Optimized

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to FLACRONCV. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.

license.title: 2. Use License
license.content: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on FLACRONCV's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:

list.2: Use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display;
list.3: Attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on FLACRONCV's website;
list.4: Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials;
list.5: Transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" the materials on any other server.

disclaimer.title: 3. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The materials on FLACRONCV's website are provided "as is". FLACRONCV makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties.

limitations.title: 4. Limitations
limitations.content: In no event shall FLACRONCV or its suppliers be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on FLACRONCV's website.

subscriptions.title: 5. Subscriptions and Payments
subscriptions.content: Some features of FLACRONCV require a subscription. You agree to pay all fees charged to your account based on the pricing and billing terms presented at the time of subscription.

privacy.title: 6. Privacy Policy
privacy.content: Your use of FLACRONCV is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which can be found

governingLaw.title: 7. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws applicable in your jurisdiction.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: FLACRONCV reserves the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will provide at least 30 days' notice for any material changes.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.text: At FLACRONCV, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our resume and cover letter creation services.

info.title: 2. Information We Collect
info.text: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways, including:

personal.title: 2.1 Personal Data
personal.text: When you register an account or use our services, we may collect personally identifiable information, such as your:

usage.title: 2.2 Usage Data
usage.text: We may also collect information on how the service is accessed and used. This data may include:

items.pagesVisited: Pages of our service that you visit
items.visitTime: Time and date of your visit

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.text: We may use the information we collect about you to:

items.service: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.notices: Send you technical notices and support messages
items.feedback: Respond to your comments and questions
items.fraud: Detect, investigate and prevent fraudulent transactions and other illegal activities

sharing.title: 4. Sharing Your Information
sharing.text: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties except in the following cases:

items.providers: With service providers who perform services on our behalf
items.defense: To protect and defend our rights and property
items.consent: With your consent or at your direction

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the security of your personal information. However, please be aware that no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.

rights.title: 6. Your Data Protection Rights
rights.text: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal data, such as:

items.access: The right to access your personal data
items.rectify: The right to rectify inaccurate personal data
items.erase: The right to erasure of your personal data
items.restrict: The right to restrict processing of your personal data
items.object: The right to object to processing of your personal data

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please

contactPage.description: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.

error.enhancingCoverLetter: Error enhancing cover letter with OpenAI:

defaults.resumeSummary: Dedicated and versatile professional with a proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions. Adept at leveraging technical expertise and collaborative skills to drive project success and achieve business objectives.
defaults.technicalSkillsList: JavaScript, React, Node.js, HTML/CSS, Git, REST APIs
defaults.softSkillsList: Communication, Problem-solving, Team collaboration, Time management
defaults.coverLetterExperience: I bring over 5 years of experience in developing web applications and software solutions that deliver exceptional user experiences. In my current role at XYZ Company, I led the development of a customer portal that increased user engagement by 45% and reduced support tickets by 30%.
defaults.coverLetterSkills: My technical skills include proficiency in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and AWS cloud infrastructure. I excel at building scalable applications and implementing CI/CD pipelines to ensure efficient development workflows.
defaults.coverLetterMotivation: I am particularly excited about the opportunity to join {{company}} because of your focus on innovative solutions and commitment to customer success. The {{position}} aligns perfectly with my career goals and I believe I can make significant contributions to your team.
defaults.coverLetterClosing: I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how my skills and experience can benefit your team. Thank you for considering my application.

academiccoverLetter.intro2: . With my academic background, research experience, and teaching qualifications, I am confident in my ability to make valuable contributions to your department.

corporatecoverLetter.intro1: I am writing to apply for the
corporatecoverLetter.intro2: . With my professional background and skillset specifically aligned with your requirements, I am confident in my ability to make immediate contributions to your organization.

card.defaultsummary: Dedicated and versatile professional with a proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions. Adept at leveraging technical expertise and collaborative skills to drive project success and achieve business objectives.
